text: as of April 2020, this is where you want to go. try the other links in the summer.

linkTitle: styled version of the simple system
text: Does everything the simple system does, but adds your own custom css. Just add your css file to public folder and you should be good to go.

In development. Will ultimately pull records from Airtable rather than the folder structure of this repo. And it will be beautiful. And slick. But for now we have to just be OK with the simple and simple styled options.
